content: Aug 4 First Hawaiian Inc's shares rose as much as 6.5 percent in their debut on Thursday  valuing the lender at $3.41 billion in the biggest initial public offering by a U.S. bank in nearly two years.
name: First Hawaiian Inc
title: First Hawaiian shares rise in debut

content: First Hawaiian Inc   the Honolulu-based bank controlled by France's BNP Paribas SA   said on Wednesday it had raised $485 million in an initial public offering (IPO)  giving it a market valuation of about $3.21 billion.
name: First Hawaiian Inc
title: First Hawaiian bank raises $485 million in IPO

content: Aug 3 First Hawaiian Inc  the Honolulu-based bank controlled by France's BNP Paribas SA   said on Wednesday it had raised $485 million in an initial public offering (IPO)  giving it a market valuation of about $3.21 billion.
name: First Hawaiian Inc
title: REFILE-UPDATE 2-First Hawaiian bank raises $485 million in IPO

title: BRIEF-First Hawaiian prices IPO at $23 per share
